posts.post_content:
Here is the deal. I'm working on my back run right now. I want to upgrade two of them. Both HOFers and with somewhat "rarer" backs.
They are;
Hugh Duffy SC 350-460 Fac 42
Vic Willis (Throwing) SC 350-460 Fac 25

I will trade these two for the following package:

Another SC 350-460 Fac 25
Another SC 350-460 Fac 42
A Sov 460
Moran - Providence - any back

Cards must be clean, some creases are fine, but no paper loss front or back.
The Moran is for my Providence team. He is the last I need.

So, you can get two HOFers for four common players. Great deal for a HOF collector.

Let's see if we can work out a deal. Here are the scans:

[URL=http://s326.photobucket.com/user/xplainer2010/media/2015-10-30%201a%20001_zpsyxcfe9tz.jpg.html][IMG]http://i326.photobucket.com/albums/k407/xplainer2010/2015-10-30%201a%20001_zpsyxcfe9tz.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

 [URL=http://s326.photobucket.com/user/xplainer2010/media/2015-10-30%201a%20002_zpstnw8zbfi.jpg.html][IMG]http://i326.photobucket.com/albums/k407/xplainer2010/2015-10-30%201a%20002_zpstnw8zbfi.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

100 plus views with no offers.
Am I going about this wrong?
Feedback is welcomed.
I'm a big boy. You won't hurt my feelings.:D
hey, great cards.  unfortunately I don't have what your looking for in trade.  if you are open to selling one or both shoot me a PM with what your looking for.  otherwise, good luck with your search!
